targets.rawSql: SELECT speicher_oben FROM solvis ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT heizungspuffer_oben FROM solvis ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT heizungspuffer_unten FROM solvis ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT speicher_unten FROM solvis ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT solar_kollektor FROM solvis ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT solar_leistung FROM solvis ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
    TO_CHAR(time_bucket('1 day', time), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS date,
    integral(time_weight('linear', time, solar_leistung), 'hours')::NUMERIC(6,2) AS leistung
FROM
    solvis
WHERE time >= CURRENT_DATE 
GROUP BY time_bucket('1 day', time)
ORDER BY time_bucket('1 day', time) ASC

SELECT time_bucket('$__interval', time) AS time, 
  AVG(solar_kollektor) AS Kollektor, 
  AVG(solar_vorlauf) AS Vorlauf, 
  AVG(solar_ruecklauf) AS Rücklauf, 
  AVG(solar_waermetauscher) AS Wärmetauscher, 
  AVG(solar_leistung) AS Leistung 
FROM solvis 
WHERE  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time_bucket('$__interval', time) 
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT
    TO_CHAR(time_bucket('1 day', time, 'Europe/Vienna'), 'MM-DD') AS date,
    (integral(time_weight('linear', time, solar_leistung), 'hours'))::NUMERIC(4,2) AS leistung
FROM
    solvis
WHERE time >= CURRENT_DATE - 7 
GROUP BY time_bucket('1 day', time, 'Europe/Vienna')
ORDER BY time_bucket('1 day', time, 'Europe/Vienna') ASC

SELECT time_bucket('$__interval', time) AS time, 
  AVG(speicher_oben) AS Speicher_Oben, 
  AVG(heizungspuffer_oben) AS Heizungspuffer_Oben, 
  AVG(heizungspuffer_unten) AS Heizungspuffer_Unten, 
  AVG(speicher_unten) AS Speicher_Unten,
  AVG((speicher_oben+speicher_unten)/2) AS Durchschnitt,
  EVERY(pumpe_heizkreis1) AS Heizkreis,
  EVERY(durchfluss > 0) AS Warmwasser
FROM solvis 
WHERE  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time_bucket('$__interval', time) 
ORDER BY "time"

SET max_parallel_workers_per_gather = 0;
SELECT
    TO_CHAR(time_bucket('1 day', time, 'Europe/Vienna'), 'MM-DD') AS date,
    (integral(time_weight('linear', time, kessel_leistung), 'hours'))::NUMERIC(5,2) AS leistung
FROM
    solvis
WHERE time >= CURRENT_DATE - 7 
GROUP BY time_bucket('1 day', time, 'Europe/Vienna')
ORDER BY time_bucket('1 day', time, 'Europe/Vienna') ASC

SELECT time_bucket('$__interval', time) AS time, 
  AVG(kessel) AS Kessel,
  EVERY(kessel_ladepumpe) AS Pumpe,
  EVERY(kessel_brenner) AS Brenner
FROM solvis 
WHERE  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time_bucket('$__interval', time) 
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT TO_CHAR(time_bucket('1 day', time, 'Europe/Vienna'), 'MM-DD') AS date, MIN(outdoor_temperature) AS min, MAX(outdoor_temperature) AS max
FROM weather 
WHERE time >= CURRENT_DATE - 7
GROUP BY time_bucket('1 day', time, 'Europe/Vienna')
ORDER BY time_bucket('1 day', time, 'Europe/Vienna') ASC

SELECT solar_kollektor, solar_vorlauf, solar_ruecklauf, solar_waermetauscher, solar_leistung, speicher_oben, heizungspuffer_oben, heizungspuffer_unten, speicher_unten FROM solvis ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT solarradiation FROM weather ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT warmwasser, kaltwasser, zirkulation, durchfluss, speicher_oben, heizungspuffer_oben, heizungspuffer_unten, speicher_unten FROM solvis ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT vorlauf_heizkreis1, vorlauf_heizkreis2, pumpe_heizkreis1, pumpe_heizkreis2, kessel, kessel_leistung, kessel_ladepumpe, kessel_brenner, speicher_oben, heizungspuffer_oben, heizungspuffer_unten, speicher_unten FROM solvis ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT outdoor_temperature, indoor_temperature FROM weather ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
